item.description:
That's right, I'm issuing an ultimatum...you could call it Jason's Ultimatum. Or use my other last name...Jason...Bourne's Ultimatum! Come see this film or there will be no measure to how fast and how hard I will be at your doorstep!

THE FLICK: Unless a bunch of people demand another venue (No. Haven, Orange, or Milford), we'll be seeing this at the Criterion Cinemas in downtown New Haven, 7:10pm. We'll aim to buy our tickets around 6:50pm. Criterion also sells fancy (& mundane) snacks and liquor.

DINNER: Frank and Alexis & I are doing dinner before-hand at Soul de Cuba (on Crown by corner of York) around 5:10. If interested in joining, mention in your RSVP, or call or text me sometime.

POST-SHOW: I don't know if there will be a post-show gathering, if you want to join in then you'll have to text me to see what people are doing.

HOST: Jason Bourne, cell 203-901-4957 (I'll be in disguise...my normally blonde hair will be dyed brown as you see in the photo below, and I'll be much more handsome than in the movie)

The Bourne Ultimatum, PG-13, 1hr 51min.
Criterion Cinema is at 86 Temple St.
http://www.criterionc...

PARKING: Temple Garage across the street is 24 hr, and Criterion will give you a validation stub (if you ask) which will allow you to park there a LONG time for $3.

FREE STUFF: Criterion has a free "club" you can join that will allow you to buy discount tickets sometimes and earn free admissions, etc. Worth joining if you're ever going back.

If you want to arrange car-pools, chat about the event, etc, click here to visit the thread on the message board
item.name: Tue 8/7-Attend this or else!
